mm_email_disabled_error.message: Masked Emails have been disabled for your account.

mm_email_disabled_faq_details.message: Masked Emails are real email addresses that are automatically set up to forward to your personal email address.  This means you can still receive emails from the website you give your Masked Email to, but they won't know your actual address.  If you ever want to stop receiving emails from that website, MaskMe lets you block a specific MaskedEmail at the click of a button.

mm_feedback_workingHard.message: Our team is dedicated to making MaskMe a great product. Your input means a lot to us.

mm_help_active_modal_Body.message: Masked Cards let you be in charge of who can or can't charge you. At any time you can Deactivate your Masked Cards. Doing so prevents any further charges from being applied to your card. You will also be automatically refunded for any remaining balance available on your Masked Card.

mm_help_active_to_date_modal_Body.message: Masked Cards get created with an automatic closing date, after which no new charges can occur on the card.  This date isn't tied to the expiration date that's on your card (the month and year you usually provide as part of your billing information).  So, if your card's expiration date is April 2016 but the closing date is January 2014, your card won't accept new authorizations past January 2014.

mm_help_canceled_modal_Body.message: This charge was initially authorized for the merchant but then the merchant decided to cancel it. If this was a small authorization, it could have been the merchant testing the validity of your credit card. Please contact the merchant directly if you need more information.

mm_help_howAccess.message: How do I access my accounts from a different device?

mm_help_howPrevent.message: How do I prevent other users of my computer from viewing my stuff?

mm_help_loveToHear.message: We'd love to hear from you.  Feel free to send us bug reports, feature requests, or love letters.

mm_help_noEmails.message: I gave a website a Masked Email but I haven't received any emails. What gives?

mm_help_status_modal_Body.message:
Pending transactions have been authorized, but not yet processed for payment. Once processed, these transactions will become Completed.

Pending transactions will be deducted from your available credit on a Masked Card since it is an expected expense that the merchant has been allowed to proceed with.

Note that the dollar amount for Pending transactions may vary from the final Completed amount. This practice is common for merchants that validate your card before the amount is finalized.

mm_help_test_auth_modal_Body.message: Some websites check the validity of your card with a small authorization. This practice is quite common. Once your purchase is finalized, this authorization will be canceled and a new one created for the full value of your purchase.

mm_help_whatDoes.message: What does MaskMe store about me?

Because MaskMe keeps your data completely private by using your actual password to encrypt it, resetting your password will unfortunately wipe all your current MaskMe account information. You should only do this if you are absolutely sure you don't remember your password.

mm_uninstall_noLongerWant.message: If you no longer want to use MaskMe, you can request that all your account information be deleted from our servers. For the most part your data is encrypted & stored locally on your computer anyways, but everybody likes a clean slate, and we respect that.
